content: I’m a newcomer to quantum information field. And I’m interested in the interaction between quantum many-body system and quantum information processing.
summary: I’m a newcomer to quantum information field. And I’m interested in the interaction between quantum many-body system and quantum information processing.

content: Work with Sitian. The motivation is to apply Bayesian unfolding on data in heavy ions collisions experiment, in order to eliminate the smearing effects from statistic error. In the project, the data are generated by priori distribution, which is multi-dimensional. Some simple de-correlation models are introduced to simulate the effects in HIC.
summary: Work with Sitian Qian. The motivation is to apply Bayesian unfolding on data in heavy ions collisions experiment, in order to eliminate the smearing effects from statistic error. The data are generated by priori distribution, which is multi-dimensional.
title: Bayesian Unfolding on HIC-based Data
